type.description:
## Living

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/living)

Checks if the entity is an instance of [`LivingEntity`](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/living), or in simple terms, a mob or a player.

Type ID: `origins:living`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:living"
}
```
